dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 04, 2005 1:34 PM
To: legal@damprabbit.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: RPhillips@damprabbit.com <legal@damprabbit.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Thursday, March 3, 2005, 7:47:07 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright infringement

===8<==============Original message text=============== Hello, apparently a
server you are running is stealing our copyrighted material and costing us
hundreds of dollars in server fees.

You can see our copyright clearly displayed on this page.

http://www.jengajam.com/r/ing-amazing-juggler

The site jengajam.com seems to be bringing in advertising revenue based on
our content which they display in their frame with their name.

Please take the necessary steps to end your contribution in this blatant
violation.

Thank you
R. Phillips



===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCKLgUvK/XpJs6oyURAvbfAKCC6W2F7jrVYYxPqdSYAomD0sbJWQCghGvQ
iJ6rPMG9CI0dtTNf+pBDFAk=
=+RkV
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
